game.title: A Dragon Named Coal
game.description:
A choice driven RPG set in a dark fantasy world. Play as Coal, a little dragon who wants to be a knight.The game is primarily being created by a husband and wife game studio. Currently we're actively developing for Mac, Windows, Linux and the game will be DRM-Free. With a primary focus on Steam.
If Disney and the manga Berserk had a baby, you’d end up with A Dragon Named Coal. The game has visceral elements of Game of Thrones and doesn’t shy away from mature subject matter. At the same time it focuses on fable based storytelling mechanics.

history.text:
This project started with the idea of a crippled, flightless dragon who wants to be a knight. That desire leads to Coal being outcast from dragon society and shunned.
The primary emotional themes we built the game on are loneliness, bullying, and depression. Ash and Rachel both experienced bullying while growing up and wanted to incorporate some of the strong feelings into the game. These themes bleed into every aspect of the game from the design and aesthetic, to mechanics.
